The City of Olney provides online access to the following minutes for transparency, and as a courtesy to the citizens of Olney. The City of Olney will provide a copy of the recorded minutes to anyone who requests a copy.

[Click here for more information or to request a copy](https://www.cityofolneytx.com/citycouncil/page/request-meeting-minutes)
